mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MO_NLEVEL ,MO_NSEQ ,MO_CSECTIONID_CK ,MO_CSECTIONNAME ,MO_CPARENTID FROM (SELECT o.MO_NLEVEL ,o.MO_NSEQ ,o.MO_CSECTIONID_CK ,o.MO_CSECTIONNAME ,o.MO_CPARENTID FROM MAST_ORGANISATION o WHERE MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = #{custID} AND MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = #{compID} AND MO_CLANGUAGE = #{lang} AND MO_DSTART <= SYSDATE AND MO_DEND >= SYSDATE AND MO_CSECTIONID_CK IN (SELECT TBND_CSECTIONID FROM TMG_BULK_NTF_DETAIL WHERE TBND_NTBNID_FK = #{seq})) START WITH MO_CSECTIONID_CK in ( SELECT TBND_CSECTIONID FROM TMG_BULK_NTF_DETAIL WHERE TBND_NTBNID_FK = #{seq}) CONNECT BY MO_CSECTIONID_CK = PRIOR MO_CPARENTID ORDER SIBLINGS BY MO_NSEQ, MO_CSECTIONID_CK
